stu_tags: EXTRA CREDIT  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  LECTURE HEAVY
comments: Damon gets a bad rep, but hes actually a really good professor. If you go to class, he gives you all the answers just print off the study guide and he answers every question. His tests are straight forward and his lab is super super easy. Sure, he mumbles but sit up front and you can hear him fine, he wont call on you ever.

comments: The class wasn\'t too hard but he talks really quietly and the lectures are very boring. He is also a difficult grader and randomly takes off points without giving feedback. If you study, you\'ll get a good grade but if you\'re looking for an interesting class, this isn\'t it.

stu_tags: TEST HEAVY  GRADED BY FEW THINGS  TOUGH GRADER
comments: In the beginning of the semester he was a very nice Pr. but as it progressed he became very irritable towards students and it reflected on how much pickier he became on grading both tests and labs. Your grade in the class depends on 4 tests (2/3 of your overall grade) and labs (1/3 of your overall grade). Very lecture heavy and quiet speaker

comments: nice enough guy but his lectures are kind of boring and he\'s kind of hard to hear. Really tough grader on labs but if you study you should do well on the exams. I would recommend taking the course with him, but its nothing to write home about either.
